CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace.  Only available in the United States.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
OldVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
CurrentVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
OldVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Alignment view
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals announces the release of the alignment view, designed to help users visualize how their work contributes to top-level organizational goals more efficiently than ever before. With this revamped experience, users can quickly gain a bird's eye view of their objectives and expand or collapse them to different levels from the chart. This feature will provide users with a more comprehensive understanding of their progress towards team goals, helping them to stay aligned with the teams' objectives.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Alignment view
OldVersion.description: Viva Goals announces the release of the alignment view, designed to help users visualize how their work contributes to top-level organizational goals more efficiently than ever before. With this revamped experience, users can quickly gain a bird's eye view of their objectives and expand or collapse them to different levels from the chart. This feature will provide users with a more comprehensive understanding of their progress towards team goals, helping them to stay aligned with the teams' objectives.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
CurrentVersion.description: From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
OldVersion.description: From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description:
Users can access the
Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their
sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when
needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a weblink to reference files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
OldVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
OldVersion.description: ,Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
CurrentVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
OldVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
OldVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
OldVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our service’s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail.
